Record.Term: with Excess of Blasts Anemia, Refractory
Record.ClassificationPath: Hemic and Lymphatic Diseases/Hematologic Diseases/Anemia/Anemia, Refractory/Anemia, Refractory, with Excess of Blasts
Hemic and Lymphatic Diseases/Hematologic Diseases/Bone Marrow Diseases/Myelodysplastic Syndromes/Anemia, Refractory/Anemia, Refractory, with Excess of Blasts
Record.BroaderTerm: Anemia, Refractory, with Excess of Blasts
Record.Synonym: Refractory Anemia with Excess of Blasts
Record.Description: Chronic refractory anemia with granulocytopenia, and/or thrombocytopenia. Myeloblasts and progranulocytes constitute 5 to 40 percent of the nucleated marrow cells.
